works.description:
Title: Divorce Advice and Help For Women
Excerpt: This site is dedicated to helping women take control of their  
divorce.  You'll find comprehensive information on the legal, financial,  
and emotional aspects, as well as articles for starting over.  Gain  
practical strategies for coping with all areas of this uncertain time by  
reading through the following sections.

Title: Do You Need Divorce Advice?
Excerpt: Hi, my name is Tracy,
I went through a divorce myself, and have worked with divorcing women for  
several years.  I know from experience what an impact divorce can have on a  
woman’s life.

When I went through my divorce, I was emotionally raw, worn down by all the  
decisions to be made, and frustrated by the lack of good information.

Consequently, I made my fair share of mistakes.  Having learned my lessons  
the hard way, I made a promise to myself that no woman would ever have to  
face this journey alone. As a result, I started the WomansDivorce website  
in 2001 to help other women going through a divorce, and have done so ever  
since.
